name: Create Fibonacci class
description: In order to estimate a efforts for upcoming tasks, a product owner likes to map all the developers estimates to such fibonacci numbers and asks you the write a class providing the closest fibonacci number, matching the users input.

name: Create a Task GUI
description: Develop a simple GUI displaying Tasks with their description and efforts.

name: Submit sources
description: Zip your sources, or put them to some Github Repository. Send a mail to trinamiX with your submission.
